title: Game Crashing without Bugsplat Error Message
body: So I was playing a normal draft game and had some issues. I loaded in at around 2 minutes even though I had been at 100% for at least 45 seconds, then at around 3:10 the game crashed with no bugsplat error message, and it was not related to my internet. So I tried to reconnect, and immediately the game crashed again with no bugsplat. I attempted to reconnect 2 more times with the same result, although on those 2 tries I was able to get some percentage on my connection. I crashed a total of 4 times. I just want to know if this is a problem with my computer or a problem with the client that needs to be repaired or what, because I most likely got a low priority queue because of this which I am not very happy about. Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
Random crashes can be caused be a number of different factors. Most likely, there are poor interactions going on with your drivers or hardware that are causing this crash. I recommend working through our [Crashing Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) as your first step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
